title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1020.4 - Stalled vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1020.4 - Stalled vehicles

State Regulations

Stalled vehicles may be removed from the vehicular
crossings by the Triborough Bridge and Tunnel Authority, and such removal will
be at the owner's risk. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1020.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
